column1: nancy jane long| nancy jane wilkinson long
column4: 2015 at hospice compassionate care center in richmond. nancy was born in richmond on september 17
column5: 1948 to edwin holmes wilkinson and marion douglas wilkinson
column6: both of whom preceded her in death. she was a data specialist in the career and co-op services office at eastern kentucky university. nancy was also an ordained minister in the christian church (disciples of christ). survivors include: one daughter
column13: helen buchanan; and five nieces and nephews
column18: and mark wilkinson. she was preceded in death by her husband
column21: douglas holmes wilkinson. funeral services for nancy long will be held at 11:00 a. m. on thursday
column24: with dr. glenn birkett and dr. robert vickers officiating. visitation will be from 5:00- 8:00 p. m. on wednesday
